will focus`` externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership,'' the company announced. Eric Schmidt will act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said in a press release.`` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.''
